snippet: Jordan Schermerhorn, winner of the 2012 win-a-trip contest, writes about the benefits of U.S. development aid in Lesotho.
abstract: Jordan Schermerhorn, winner of the 2012 win-a-trip contest, writes about the benefits of U.S. development aid in Lesotho.

headline.main: Win-a-Trip Diary: Seeing the Power of Foreign Aid
